What are the treatments for Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Smith-Lemli-Opitz Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis
